message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase this unique product. I believe it's a game-changer, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to start the conversation at $1000000.
I'm interested in the product, but I think it's a bit pricey. I'm willing to pay $800000 for it.
